        public static boolean isWordUsed(java.util.List<java.lang.String> usedWords,
                                 java.lang.String createdWord)
        Check if the word is already used
        Parameters:
        usedWords - : the list of used words
        createdWord - : the word to check
        Returns:

      • getCharAtPosition

        public static java.lang.String getCharAtPosition(java.lang.String word,
                                                 int charPosition)
        Get the character at the current position. If the character's position doesn't exist, return an empty string.
        Parameters:
        word - : the word to get the character
        charPosition - : the position of the character to get
        Returns:
        the character at the charPosition of word, empty string if not found

      • rankFound

        public static boolean rankFound(int currentRank,
                                int searchedRank)
        Check if the current rank matches the searched rank
        Parameters:
        currentRank - : The current rank
        searchedRank - : The rank we look for
        Returns:
        true if the current rank is greater than the searched rank
